Class Interface

java.lang.Object
Interface
public class Interface extends Object
Dominick Vician, CEN-3024C-24204, March 30th, 2025 Interface.java This class contains all the business logic that is used in each method, as well as interfacing with the database via DatabaseManager.java such that the user never directly accesses database-specific details.

    • Interface

      public Interface()

  • Method Details

    • addVehicle

      public boolean addVehicle(Integer vin, String make, String model, int year, int mileage, double price, String color)
      addVehicle - Directly adds the vehicle to the MySQL database.
      Parameters:
      vin - An integer containing the Vehicle Identification Number of the vehicle
      make - A string containing the make of the vehicle e.g. Toyota, Dodge
      model - A string containing the model of the vehicle e.g. Prius, Charger
      year - An integer representing the year this car was made
      mileage - An integer representing how many miles this car has driven
      price - A double representing the price of this vehicle when it was first released
      color - A string representing the color of the vehicle e.g. Red, Neon Pink
      Returns:
      boolean - true if the vehicle was added successfully, false otherwise

    • removeVehicle

      public boolean removeVehicle(Integer vin)
      Removes the vehicle with the specified VIN from the MySQL database.
      Parameters:
      vin - An Integer representing the Vehicle Identification Number.
      Returns:
      boolean - true if the vehicle was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateVehicle

      public boolean updateVehicle(Integer vin, String newMake, String newModel, Integer newYear, Integer newMileage, Double newPrice, String newColor)
      Updates the vehicle record in the MySQL database. The method retrieves the existing record, applies any non-null or non-empty changes, and updates the record.
      Parameters:
      vin - An integer representing the Vehicle Identification Number of the vehicle to update.
      newMake - A String containing the new make of the vehicle (or null/empty to leave unchanged).
      newModel - A String containing the new model of the vehicle (or null/empty to leave unchanged).
      newYear - An Integer representing the new year (or null to leave unchanged).
      newMileage - An Integer representing the new mileage (or null to leave unchanged).
      newPrice - A Double representing the new price (or null to leave unchanged).
      newColor - A String representing the new color (or null/empty to leave unchanged).
      Returns:
      boolean - true if the vehicle was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • getAllVehicles

      public List<Vehicle> getAllVehicles()
      Retrieves all vehicles from the MySQL database.
      Returns:
      a List of Vehicle objects representing all vehicles in the database.

    • computeCurrentPrice

      public Double computeCurrentPrice(Integer vin, double depRate, int currentYear)
      Computes the current price of a vehicle using a depreciation formula.
      Parameters:
      vin - An integer representing the Vehicle Identification Number.
      depRate - A double representing the depreciation rate (e.g., 0.1 for 10%).
      currentYear - An int representing the current year.
      Returns:
      Double - the computed current price if successful, or null if the vehicle is not found or an error occurs.
